channel.title: Server restart problem
channel.description:
HELLO I REALLY NEED HELP
IS THERE A SUCH THING AS AUTO RESTART THAT SAVE PEOPLE CHARTER FILE??
THE AUTO RESTART I GOT DONT SAVE PEOPLE CHARTER FILE IT JUST DOES A ROLLBACK ONCE IT RESTARTED.

Im willing to come to a deal though if you want it.
